resources.name: Project Reentry
resources.description: Project ReEntry (make sure you click on "Previously Incarcerated") provides transition services up to 18 months before release and long-term services afterward, including job services and training through Goodwill. E-mail tfultz@goodwillwnc.org or call (336) 724-3625 ext. 1332 for more information.

resources.name: Green Opportunities
resources.description: Green Opportunities offers job training for everyone. There are multiple opportunities, including restaurant job skills training and construction, as well as general employment skills support. Check out some of the free classes offered in partnership with A-B Tech for qualified applicants.

resources.name: Eliada ESTA Program
resources.description: The ESTA program trains and equips students, 16 to 22 years old, who face significant challenges, helping them discover and reach their fullest potential.
